title: 48 Kilos SFX Pack
description: An all 48kHz @ 24-bit library that provides you with a 4.6 GB tempest of assorted audio assets. Small footprint, big effects.
longDescription:
Listen to Preview

Light, streamlined, and diverse.

We proudly present 48 Kilos, our all 48kHz @ 24-bit library that provides you with a 4.4 GB tempest of audio assets. Perfect for all audio needs in film, animation, interactive interface design, game design, music production, and audio branding where high quality audio is desired with no re-sampling required. 

Included are breaking bulbs, mechanical gates and doors, the smashing of liquid-filled vessels, manipulating musical instruments, blades, books, ceramics, film, resonant impacts, an AC unit, and much more. They are presented in an assortment of mono and stereo recordings, recorded in a variety of settings (on location, in studio, and a few interesting creative spaces).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Wide array of assorted, utilitarian, and unique sound assets
  •  Mono + Stereo
  •  UCS-compliant metadata


Number of Audio Waves: 407

Number of Audio Cues: 407

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz / 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some

Minutes of audio provided: 204

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Metadata: Link
